sourcesContent:
<template>
    <a-modal :title="`为 ${role.roleName} 配置权限`" :visible="value" :width="300"
             @cancel="bindClickCancel" @ok="bindClickSubmit"
             cancelText="取消" okText="提交">
        <a-tree checkable checkStrictly
                :defaultCheckedKeys="defaultCheckedKeys" :treeData="treeDataSource"
                @check="bindClickCheck"/>
    </a-modal>
</template>

<script>

    let treeDataSource = [];
    let checkedIds = [];
    let defaultCheckedKeys = [];

    export default {
        name: "RoleConfig",
        props: {
            value: {
                type: Boolean,
                default: false
            },
            role: {
                type: Object,
                default() {
                    return {}
                }
            }
        },
        data() {
            return {
                checkedIds,
                treeDataSource,
                defaultCheckedKeys,
            }
        },
        methods: {
            apiFetchMenu() {
                return this.$request.get('/menu').then(res => {
                    if (res.data.code === 0) this.treeDataSource = res.data.data.rows.children;
                    return res;
                })
            },
            apiModifyRole(role) {
                return this.$request.put('/role', role);
            },
            fetchMenuList() {
                this.apiFetchMenu();
            },
            bindClickSubmit() {
                this.role.menuId = this.checkedIds.join(',');

                this.apiModifyRole(this.role).then(() => {
                    this.bindClickCancel();
                    this.$emit("success");
                });
            },
            bindClickCancel() {
                this.defaultCheckedKeys = [];
                this.checkedIds = [];
                this.$emit("input", false);
            },
            bindClickCheck(e) {
                this.checkedIds = e.checked;
            }
        },
        watch: {
            role() {
                this.fetchMenuList();
            }
        }
    }
</script>
